description.translate: The primordial night doesn't seem that far away anymore.

items.nbt: {display:{Name:"\"§9Pénombre\"","Lore":["{\"text\":\"§7L'étrenne nuit ne semble plus\"}","{\"text\":\"§7aussi lointaine.\"}","{\"text\":\"§7The primordial night doesn't seem\"}","{\"text\":\"§7that far away anymore.\"}","{\"text\":\"§7STR§a1 §7HUN§c-1\"}"]}}
